Aurelia Show Ballet

An exquisite show for you and those with whom you share the celebration. Two or three graceful dancers will mesmerize you and your guests with the following performances:
Show by Anastasia
Influenced by the cultures of Orient and Occident, traditional Russian Dance is an energy boost for a vibrant party. Feel the scope and generosity of the Russian soul in combination with the polished movements of the dancers
Learn more
Armenian Dance
The bright costumes will transfer your imagination to the world of original Armenian culture. Experience the combination of spiritual grandeur and the grace of movement in an unforgettable spectacle.
Learn more
Burlesque
With its theatrical sense, a bright and entertaining Burlesque show will bring joy to your event. The mixture of dance, acrobatic and acting elements create a unique atmosphere for everyone's aesthetic pleasure.
Learn more
Belly Dance
Why not double or triple up on the exquisite dance show? Anastasia, Mary, and other recognized dance stars of Aurelia Show Ballet will impress you and your guests with the classical group Belly Dance performance.
Learn more
Wedding Dance Accompaniment
Make this special day unforgettable. The wedding dance with a ballet dancer's professional accompaniment will impress your guests and create luxurious moments for wedding photos and videos. Get a wonderful experience and precious memories with Aurelia Show Ballet.
Learn more
Performance and Lesson
What could be more beautiful than watching a flawless dance? Give yourself an even broader experience by joining the dance magic. Professional ballet dancers of Aurelia Show Ballet can give you or your children a great dance lesson. It's definitely worth trying!
Learn more
